original_text: Therefore will I do unto this house, which is called by my name, wherein ye trust, and unto the place which I gave to you and to your fathers, as I have done to Shiloh.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 실로에 행함 같이 너희가 신뢰하는 바 내 이름으로 일컬음을 받는 이 집 곧 너희와 너희 조상들에게 준 이 곳에 행하겠고

sentences.original_text: Therefore will I do unto this house
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 이 집에 행할 것은

sentences.original_text: which is called by my name
which I gave to you and to your fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너와 너의 조상들에게 준 곳

sentences.original_text: as I have done to Shiloh
